metadata.title: CVE-2024-39223 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An authentication bypass in the SSH service of gost v2.11.5 allowsattackers to intercept communications via setting the HostKeyCallbackfunction to ssh.InsecureIgnoreHostKey

criterions.comment: gost package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
